column3: select Col2,sum(Col15) where Col1 is not null and Col15 is not null group by Col2 label Col2 'Employee', sum(Col15) 'Actual Hours'
select Col2,count(Col6) where Col1 is not null and Col9 = 'Done' group by Col2 label Col2 'Employee', count(Col6) 'Done Tasks'
select Col2,count(Col6) where Col1 is not null and Col9 = 'In Progress' group by Col2 label Col2 'Employee', count(Col6) 'In Progress Tasks'
select Col2,count(Col6) where Col1 is not null and Col9 = 'Blocked' group by Col2 label Col2 'Employee', count(Col6) 'Blocked Tasks'
